data.description:
Please note: this is an app under development. Please write  info@perspektiva360.com, if you want to try it with the pin code and visit this website to get on the waitlist: https://perspektiva360.com/en/makondo-software-house/tumbaovr-waitlist/ . 
Dive into the rhythm with Tumbao VR: Dance Your Worries Away! The virtual reality experience that will have you dancing salsa everywhere and turn you into a 'Tumbao' master.
Choose your level, hit play on the music, and watch as virtual dancers show you all the salsa steps you need to know. Join the party! and dance alongside your virtual partner to the tunes that will fill you with excitement.
Say goodbye to shyness! Tumbao is perfect for learning your first salsa steps at home. And if you already have experience, it's the perfect training app to practice the hottest and most professional Tumbao anywhere.
You no longer have to wait to be on the dance floor; you can take it with you wherever you go. Take a break at the office to relax during a busy day and get your energy pumping to the rhythm of the happiest Latin beats of all.
Moreover, Tumbao is your passport to an active lifestyle that will fill you with movement, freedom, and fun. Let the music envelop you and fill you with emotion as you forget your worries and give your body a healthy shake.
Are you ready to hit the dance floor? Download Tumbao VR and get ready to Dance Your Worries Away!

changelog.change_log: First version of this full of fun application
